he floated into a ceiling and teleported to a new dimension

the dimension took him back to his bed in our universe

then teleported him to a place where feminists chased after him

then teleported him to a place where vegans chased him again

then teleported him to a place where quarks and stuff spun around him

then teleported him to nowhere and he died of nothing

123.content:
(I'm just adding from experience type imagination but it is your story so I wonder if you would really add my account). It is actually a true story of my neighbour because I just can not make things up, I don't know why but I just can't write anything but reality)


A man woke up and walked into a room. He picked up a jacket reflectively.
It was the jacket that the love of his life had gifted to him on their anniversary. It still carried her scent from the recent time he had hugged her despite her indifference to him.
Now she was gone. She had deserted him solely because she was now wealthier than him and felt no need for him.
He was a cool Muslim guy so kind and gentle and despite the fact that she and him had had a hot love affair before marriage, yet she still fell out of love and separated from him for no reason whatsoever.
Except that she is being paid a salary higher than her husband and so thinks she is independent of men. She seems to have eyes on other men and unsuccessfully tried to attract my hubby.
I see the guy walking into an empty desolate house, heartbroken and unable to understand what went wrong. He had been married to her for a decade now yet she had begun showing the cold shoulder much earlier and slept in separate rooms for months with him unable to do anything about it.
He gave her such expensive anniversary gifts but nothing seemed to make her love him as madly and passionately as she did before they were married.
It makes me more convinced that premarital love affairs and fornication since it is forbidden by God is what leads to heartbreak and unhappy couples.
I see a man, my neighbour suffering in melancholic solitude and the wife lives in a separate house probably equally messed up.
123.title: jacket

134.content:
he removed the food from the fridge and called a fridge expert to find out what happened to his fridge

the permafrost was there from another dimension

the fridge expert removed the permafrost

and sold it

he installed a new fridge

it was the newest fridge on the market and just came from the factory

and yet

it had permafrost
134.title: and found out that his fridge had permafrost de...

1341.content: and there still was permafrost
1341.title: he later built his own fridge

1342.content:
he had a happy time eating outdoor food

but he couldnt find a fridge that didnt have permafrost on it

he moved to a new house

but there still was permafrost

he believed he was cursed

he went to his local church to see what was wrong with him

the church said he was fine and didnt have sins

he went back to his kitchen and looked inside his fridge

the permafrost spiraled and twisted towards him

it grabbed his limbs and twisted around his face

it sent him to another dimension

then he died
